content: then work 1a and then 2a do not knot the basic pattern of the kitchener stitch is 1 a insert tapestry needle into first stitch on front knitting needle as if to knit slide off knitting needle b insert tapestry needle into next stitch as if to purl leave stitch on front knitting needle 2 a insert tapestry needle into first stitch on back knitting needle as if to purl slide off knitting needle b insert tapestry needle into next stitch as if to knit leave stitch on back knitting needle you can find free ad-free videos demonstrating long tail cast on learn to knit a dishcloth - kiersten j kitchener stitch https //free-resources-kierstenj s3 us-east- 2 amazonaws com/free_videos/the_kitchener_stitch mp4 magic loop and knitting in the round https //free-resources-kierstenj s3 us-east- 2 amazonaws com/free_videos/magic_loop mp4 these videos were made for other patterns so the numbers of stitches and certain details will not be accurate for this sock but you will be able to clearly see the techniques © 2025 kiersten harrod all rights reserved go to www kierstenj com for more resources to help you be a better knitter page 7 of 7 © 2025 kiersten harrod all rights reserved go to www kierstenj com for more resources to help you be a better knitter
